meta.name: Steelmanning
meta.description: Present the strongest possible version of an opposing view before dismissing it.

whenNotToUse: User too activated to consider other views

procedure.title: Name the Opposing View
procedure.instruction: Ask: 'What's the view you disagree with? Help me understand what they believe.'

procedure.title: Build the Steelman
procedure.instruction: Ask: 'What's the STRONGEST version of that view? Why might a thoughtful, intelligent person hold it?'

procedure.title: Find the Partial Truth
procedure.instruction: Ask: 'What's the grain of truth in that view? What are they seeing that you might be missing?'

procedure.title: Hold Both
procedure.instruction: Invite: 'Now that you've seen their best case â€” does your position change? What do you still disagree with, and what do you understand better?'

successCriteria: Presents strongest version of opposing view
Finds grain of truth in opposition
User reports increased understanding (even if disagreement remains)
